Uses of Interface
org.apache.freemarker.core.AttemptExceptionReporter

  • Packages that use AttemptExceptionReporter 
    Package Description
    org.apache.freemarker.core
    The most commonly used API-s of FreeMarker; start with Configuration (see also the Getting Stared in the Manual.)

    • Uses of AttemptExceptionReporter in org.apache.freemarker.core

      Fields in org.apache.freemarker.core declared as AttemptExceptionReporter 
      Modifier and Type Field and Description
      static AttemptExceptionReporter AttemptExceptionReporter.LOG_ERROR
      Logs the exception into the "freemarker.runtime" log category with "error" log level.
      static AttemptExceptionReporter AttemptExceptionReporter.LOG_WARN
      Like LOG_ERROR, but it logs with "warn" log level.
      Methods in org.apache.freemarker.core that return AttemptExceptionReporter 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      AttemptExceptionReporter Configuration.getAttemptExceptionReporter() 
      AttemptExceptionReporter MutableProcessingConfiguration.getAttemptExceptionReporter() 
      AttemptExceptionReporter ProcessingConfiguration.getAttemptExceptionReporter()
      Specifies how exceptions handled (and hence suppressed) by an #attempt blocks will be logged or otherwise reported.
      AttemptExceptionReporter Template.getAttemptExceptionReporter() 
      AttemptExceptionReporter TemplateConfiguration.getAttemptExceptionReporter() 
      protected AttemptExceptionReporter Configuration.ExtendableBuilder.getDefaultAttemptExceptionReporter() 
      protected AttemptExceptionReporter Environment.getDefaultAttemptExceptionReporter() 
      protected abstract AttemptExceptionReporter MutableProcessingConfiguration.getDefaultAttemptExceptionReporter()
      Returns the value the getter method returns when the setting is not set (possibly by inheriting the setting value from another ProcessingConfiguration), or throws CoreSettingValueNotSetException.
      protected AttemptExceptionReporter TemplateConfiguration.Builder.getDefaultAttemptExceptionReporter()
